Why Visit Paris?

Paris, the City of Love, is home to breathtaking landmarks, rich history, and world-renowned cuisine. From the Eiffel Tower to the Louvre, every corner is filled with beauty and charm.

Best Time to Visit

April - June & September - November

Average Rating

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Currency & Language

Euro (€), French & English

Your Perfect Paris Itinerary

Day 1: Eiffel Tower & Seine River Cruise

Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower, enjoy a romantic Seine River cruise, and explore Champs-Élysées.

Day 2: Louvre Museum & Notre-Dame

Explore the world's largest art museum, the Louvre, and visit the historic Notre-Dame Cathedral.

Day 3: Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur

Discover the artistic charm of Montmartre, visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy street performances.

Day 4: Palace of Versailles

Take a day trip to the opulent Palace of Versailles and stroll through its magnificent gardens.
